#exchange format for ajax interface

= Introduction =

ajax.php  interface

*use double quote, not single quote, as php json_decode does*
= Details =
== conversation sample ==

=== post a comment ===
 # data={"eid":12321,"msg":"顶","action":"add"}  
 # {"errno":0}

=== view current comments ===
 # data={"eid":12321,"page",10,"action":"view"}  
 # {"errno":0,"contents":{"cid":100,"username":"guest1","msg":"顶1","date":"2008-11-5 11:08"},{"cid":100,"username":"guest2","msg":"顶2","date":"2008-11-5 11:07"}}

=== delete a comment ===
 # data={"cid":100,"action":"del",} 
 # {"errno":1}

=== post a rating ===
 # data={"eid":12321,"rating":5,"action":"rate"}
 # {"errno":0}

== returned errno ==
 * -1	unknown error
 * 0	success
 * 1	action not implemented
 * 2	invalid request
 * 3	not authorized
